subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Entering the weekend, N.B.A. teams are taking 23.8 3-point attempts per game, and it looks as if the record for most 3-pointers per game will be topped for the fifth consecutive season.
snippet: Entering the weekend, N.B.A. teams are taking 23.8 3-point attempts per game, and it looks as if the record for most 3-pointers per game will be topped for the fifth consecutive season.
